search_results.query: psychological effects of obesity in children

snippet.title: New calculator predicts newborn's obesity risk
snippet.description: Simply enter in the parents' BMIs, the mother's professional skill level, whether the mother smoked while pregnant, and the baby's birth weight.

snippet.title: HereO
snippet.description: This colorful, compact GPS powered smart watch tracks your kid's every move.

snippet.title: Thermal imaging may help fight obesity
snippet.description: Imaging tech that measures heat levels is being used to measure brown fat, which plays a prominent role in how quickly the body can burn calories as energy.

snippet.title: Tech gifts for children
snippet.description: Shopping for a techie gift for a young child this Christmas? Then swot up on our pick of the best kid-friendly gadgets.

snippet.title: Fragment
snippet.description: Fragment has great touch controls for doing something truly unique with your photos, but if it's a basic photo-effects app you're looking for, there are better options.

snippet.title: A breath test for... obesity?
snippet.description: A standard breath test that looks for bacterial growth in the gut could spot those with a greater risk of a certain type of obesity.

snippet.title: Study links in-utero exposure to magnetic fields to child obesity
snippet.description: Wireless devices and household appliances may impact fetal development, changing endocrine and metabolic systems, according to a large study by Kaiser Permanente.

snippet.title: Samsung Smart Camera WB350F
snippet.description: The Samsung Smart Camera WB350F is a good package if you want to add an affordable long-zoom point-and-shoot to supplement your smartphone photography.

snippet.title: Audiovox Car Connection
snippet.description: The Audiovox Car Connection's main benefit is letting parents keep track of their children's driving behavior for a relatively low per-month price.

snippet.title: FX Photo Studio (iOS)
snippet.description: FX Photo Studio stands out for the sheer number of effects that are available, but it can be a struggle to get the app to do what you want.
